docs.lead_paragraph: Doubtless many persons have said in the last week of the role of the Marquess of Quex in pinero's play, now on view at the Criterion Theatre. "What a splendid part for Charles Coghlan" But one might is well say What a splendid part for Richard Burbage, or Thomas Betterton, Charles Kenable, or Thomas Apthorpe Cooper They are not deader than Coghlan.

headline.main: AT THE THEATRES; ACTING OF JOHN HARE AND IRENE VANBRUGH IN "THE GAY LORD QUEX."
